statements: SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE product_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM supply_chain_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE root_cause IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_id = 123;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, root_cause FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE location LIKE 'Warehouse%';
SELECT incident_date, location FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE root_cause IS NOT NULL ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(incident_id) AS total_incidents FROM supply_chain_incidents GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND location = 'Factory';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents;
SELECT description, incident_date FROM supply_chain_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT location FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_id = 3;
SELECT incident_id, description, location FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE location LIKE '%warehouse%';
SELECT * FROM root_cause_analysis WHERE root_cause = 'Human error';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location, description FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE location='Factory A';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT incident_id, description FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM root_cause_analysis JOIN supply_chain_incidents ON root_cause_analysis.incident_id = supply_chain_incidents.incident_id;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS incident_count FROM supply_chain_incidents GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM incident_data;
SELECT incident_date, description FROM incident_data WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM root_cause_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT supply_chain_id, supplier, product_name FROM supply_chain ORDER BY supplier ASC;
SELECT description FROM incident_data WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM incident_data WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM root_cause_analysis WHERE cause = 'Human Error' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier, disruption_reason FROM supply_chain WHERE supplier LIKE '%Corp%' AND disruption_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT incident_id, cause, analysis_date FROM root_cause_analysis JOIN incident_data ON root_cause_analysis.incident_id = incident_data.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain ORDER BY supply_chain_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, root_cause FROM supply_chain_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, category, description FROM products WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_incidents WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, product_id, root_cause FROM supply_chain_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 200;
SELECT product_name, category, description FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT report_id, reported_by, report_date, details FROM incident_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' AND report_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, location FROM incidents;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, quantity, shipment_date FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT location, description FROM incidents WHERE incident_id = 10;
SELECT supplier_name, count(product_id) FROM suppliers INNER JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT shipment_id, quantity, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
